overview: Two people belong to different worlds and different social and class situations. One is Hassan Tayara (Khaled al-Nabawi), who has a bachelor's degree in law, but works as a microbus driver so that he can save his day. The second is the king of Razan Maghrabi, the rich girl and the daughter of one of the most influential in the country. They both fall in love, but will it go peacefully?
title: حسن طياره
